resources.string: Choose a category and let destiny decide!

Having trouble deciding? Need some inspiration? We got you! First off, Destiny needs some help, so just choose a category from the drop down menu. Secondly, press the button to find your new favorite place!
Tip! You can check out all the place information by clicking on the address, mail, phone number and website.

string.name: savedData
string.b: All saved data will also be deleted.

resources.string: Press to see more info on this favorite
Press again to delete your account
Press to close the help screen.
Have fun! Don\'t forget to Favorite, Blacklist and Share!
Please Login or Register a new account
